content: --ज्ञ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} one who appreciates the flavour or excellence of, one who knows the taste of; सांसारिकेषु च सुखेषु वयं रसज्ञाः <ls>U. 2. 22.</ls> {2} capable of discerning the beauty of things. (--ज्ञः {1} a man of taste or feeling, a critic, an appreciative person, a poet. {2} an alchemist. {3} a physician, or one who prepares mercurial or other chemical compounds. (--ज्ञा the tongue; <ls>Bv. 2. 59.</ls> (रसज्ञता-त्वं means {1} poetical skill. {2} alchemy. {3} knowledge of flavours. {4} discrimination).
